---

`r chunk_reveal("ecdf")`


```{r ecdf, include=FALSE}
set.seed(780)
rnorm(20) %>% 
  tibble(var = .) %>% #BREAK
  arrange(var) %>% #BREAK
  mutate(index = 1:n()) -> #BREAK
df
  
ggplot(data = df) +
  aes(x = var) + 
  geom_rug() + #BREAK
  aes(y = index) + #BREAK
  geom_point() + #BREAK
  geom_step() + #BREAK
  aes(y = index / 20) -> #BREAK
ecdf

ggplot(data = df) +
  aes(x = var) +
  geom_rug() +
  geom_histogram(aes(group = index),
                 color = "black") + #BREAK
  geom_histogram(color = "black") + #BREAK
  geom_histogram() -> #BREAK
hist
```

`r chunk_reveal("ecdf_large")`

```{r ecdf_large, include=FALSE}
set.seed(780)
rnorm(200) %>% 
  tibble(var = .) %>% #BREAK
  arrange(var) %>% #BREAK
  mutate(index = 1:n()) -> #BREAK
df

ggplot(data = df) +
  aes(x = var) + 
  geom_rug() + #BREAK
  aes(y = index) + #BREAK
  geom_point() + #BREAK
  geom_step() + #BREAK
  aes(y = index / 20) -> #BREAK
ecdf
  
ggplot(data = df) +
  aes(x = var) +
  geom_rug(alpha = .4) +
  geom_histogram(aes(group = index),
                 color = "black") + #BREAK
  geom_histogram(color = "black") + #BREAK
  geom_histogram() -> #BREAK
hist

ecdf / hist
```
